title: New Item Suggestion: Anti-TENACITY Boots lol
body:
A suggestion to add to the boot options. Anti-Tendency would be a good effect to have with your boot selection to help counter those who are building up a ton of tendency..

Ultimate goal of the boots would be to regain your stun time. 

Perhaps if the enemy doesn't have any tendency, the anti-tendency boots could increase your stun time by a small amount.

replies.body: How about a rune that, after four seconds in combat, converts a portion of CC into suppression (true CC) for some baseline CC to cut through Tenacity? Effect refreshed in combat for melee characters, of course. We could call it, say, CConqueror. Because CC.

*Tenacity

Regardless, tenacity isn't a problem. The whole point of the stat is to be a situational buy against stun-heavy lane opponents and comps. We don't need an item that undoes a situational stat, especially on boots. 

All this change would do is make tank's lives even harder. Assassins can't afford to buy tenacity, they need lethality, damage, and sustain. The only people who get it are the slow, beefy champions who need to wade into the middle of the enemy and soak up that CC for their team.
Situationally its still bad vs Stun heavy Comps.
TMW you realize tenacity is an Out dated stat that is ineffectual in 99% of instances

*tenacity sweety

A lot of runes that grant tenacity give up damage and tank for those stacking effects, I think it should be more punishing to take those routes rather than just empowering morgana's long ass q.
Well if they are going for cool down regain or an increase in stun duration... Then they are probably losing their magic penetration effect..  1 set of boots.

yes a 'TENACITY' regain xd. 

I think the boots could work for most characters besides just Morgana... Like lux, ori, neeko, xin's pop up, annie, perhaps even the traps for adcs like cait.. Most characters have a stun. 

If the enemy is all building up tenacity... stun tendency. Would be nice to have a counter to that cause people like Garen need to be stunned.
Nice idea, but instead of using it on reduced champs like garen it'd jist be abused by morgana and veigars already absurdly long cc.
